about.info:
Graduate in Cybersecurity in Information Technology Environments, with a strong interest in developing my professional career in the fields of software development and cybersecurity.

I have solid knowledge of Python, Django, React, Pandas, and MySQL, and I am open to learning other tech stacks.

Carbajosa de la Sagrada, Salamanca | Spain

- Development of utilities for the service.
- Database maintenance and management.

Main technologies of the service:
Oracle SQL Developer - Visual Basic - Vue.js - Python
experience.info-2:
Peñaranda de Bracamonte, Salamanca | Spain

- Maintenance and repair of computer equipment
- Network maintenance

project.info-1: A web scraper that collects, structures, and processes data on nuclear power plants worldwide.
project.info-2: Web application with a REST API using Django REST Framework and React + Vite.
project.info-3: A minimalistic web app that performs basic CRUD operations on a sample data model.
project.info-4: Cybersecurity tool designed for password encryption, decryption of hashes using dictionaries.

education.title-1: Specialization in Cybersecurity in Information Technology Environments (CETI)
